page.title: 08LONG ASHTON CARNIVAL
page.content: The Long Ashton Carnival was first held in 1980. Carnival day is when the whole village can have fun, joining in the Carnival and watching as it parades through the streets. The floats have many different themes, like Walt Disney characters, kings, like Henry VIII, or fairy-tale characters, like Hansel and Gretel,Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs or Peter Pan. The floats are placed on lorries or vans. If you don't want to go on a float you can dress up and walk around, sometimes collecting money for charity. After the parade the floats return to the village hall to be judged. Then later at night there is a Carnival Dance where you dress up as anything you want and have a good time.
